entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Ice fog patches overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. Ice fog patches in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 March 2023
